name: LinkMyPet
0:
”Alexa, ask Link Collar to check today's activity”
”Alexa, ask Link Collar to check yesterday's activity”
”Alexa, ask Link Collar to tell me how many minutes until activity goal”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: link collar
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Link My Pet can help you know your dog’s location, manage your dog’s wellness & more. Now you can access some of your Link My Pet features by talking to Alexa.
Ask Alexa to get activity, to check yesterday’s activity and how many minutes your dog has left to complete their goal. 
To get started, tap “Enable skill” and follow the screen sequence to link your Link account. Note: you must sign in with the same email tied to your Link service plan, and a service plan is required for connectivity to the Link network
 
Try asking her: 
“Alexa, ask Link Collar to check today’s activity”
“Alexa, ask Link Collar to check yesterday’s activity” 
“Alexa, ask Link Collar how many minutes until activity goal”
 
If you’d like to learn more about Link My Pet or what Alexa can do with Link My Pet, please visit our Help Center at support.linkmypet.com where you will find an Alexa section as well as other FAQ, or email us at support@linkmypet.com.
